title: How to enable download remote images in thunderbird for android

content: How do I turn on download remote images in thunderbird for android

title: Export/import to mobile
creator: DorothyJ
content: I followed the directions the directions to export and then import my settings to an Android device (this is my first time using a mobile device). I took pictures of the QR codes. I was next told, "Align the QR code provided from Thunderbird Desktop." What does that mean and how do I do it?
